reuters.title: FLORAFAX INTERNATIONAL INC <FIIF> 2ND QTR FEB 28
reuters.body: Shr profit five cts vs loss two cts Net profit 219,000 vs loss 84,000 Revs 11.7 mln vs 11.8 mln 1st half Shr profit 11 cts vs profit 12 cts Net profit 467,000 vs profit 555,000 Revs 21.2 mln vs 21.0 mln NOTE: Half net includes 93,000 dlrs vs 300,000 dlrs from litigation gains. Reuter 
